resources.string: "Match the cursive letters as fast as possible! Be aware, mistakes will count against you! Time will begin as soon as you hit ok!"

"This application was developed with the intent to teach proper cursive. Any questions, concerns, or problems with the application can be directed to takethisjaguar@gmail.com \nClick anywhere to exit.

Complete the trace in order to move on to the next letter! The next button will appear in the bottom right corner! 

Not showing up? 
 1. The trace is incomplete 
 2. Most letters can be completed with 1 continuous stroke 
 3. Your trace has too many mistakes 

Hit the eraser and try again!

Complete the trace in order to move on to the next letter! The next button will appear in the bottom right corner!

Not showing up?
 1. The trace is incomplete
 2. Most letters can be completed with 1 continuous stroke
 3. Your trace has too many mistakes

Hit the eraser and try again!
"Your time was: %s.\nTry again to beat your previous record!"
Great job completing the alphabet in cursive!
Now use a pencil and paper to write each letter after completing the trace. This will help you learn and remember the whole alphabet quickly!
"Match the cursive letters as fast as possible! Be aware, mistakes will count against you! Time will begin as soon as you hit OK!"
"This application was developed for educational purposes. Any questions, concerns, or problems with the application can be directed to n.varelas777@gmail.com.\nClick anywhere to exit.
